data.name: Obsidian Legion
data.detailed_description:
A Storm is Brewing on the Horizon

As a scout, you have been sent to investigate frontier disturbances on a small island state. As you set foot on the shore, you feel something oddly eerie about this place. Make your way through the land, find out what went wrong.

Wrestle Vicious Foes

Your enemies are as powerful as they are varied. Use your wits, skills and arsenal to engage them and claim victory. Vanquish the wicked using different weapon classes and items found along the way …

Venture Through a Land Riddled with Mysteries

Explore a vast island with landscapes ranging from muggy swamps to towering mountains. Expand your mobility and unlock the hidden paths that will allow you to travel to the far reaches of the isle.

data.short_description: Embark on a dark journey in this 2D Adventure Game. Rise to the challenge as you fight your way in a land of perils and wonders. Explore the world and collect the tools necessary to overcome the many obstacles set before you. Find the path that leads to the Obsidian Legion.
